abstract: F C Porto defeats Chelsea, 2-1, in UEFA Champions League; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: F.C. Porto beat visiting Chelsea, 2-1, in the Champions League. It was a dismal return for Chelsea Manager José Mourinho.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Porto Defeats Chelsea

snippet: F.C. Porto beat visiting Chelsea, 2-1, in the Champions League. It was a dismal return for Chelsea Manager José Mourinho.
